description:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.1b) Gecko/20020809 Debian/1.0.0-0.woody.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.1b) Gecko/20020809 Debian/1.0.0-0.woody.1

After choosing "Save this file to disk..." option in "Downloading..." dialog
nothing happens.


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to the URL
2. Press [Download] button
3. Mozilla shows dialog "Downloading presario7200_7600.pdf", choose "Save this
file to disk..." there and press Ok
4. Nothing happens. Mozilla does not open dialog to choose filename and location
where to save the file.
summary: Dialog "Enter name of file to save to..." does not appear
